questions.question: 1. A commercial motor vehicle's (CMV's) engine controls are used to:
answers: Start up and shut down the vehicles engine
Warn you when pressures or temperatures reach a dangerous level
Help you steer, accelerate, brake, and park you CMV
questions.correctAnswer: Start up and shut down the vehicles engine

5. Secondary vehicle controls:
answers: Provide backup functionality to the primary controls

Assist you in safely operating your vehicle
Are the same in every vehicle
questions.correctAnswer: Assist you in safely operating your vehicle
